data.text: @BETTY43439436 @HealthNS @nsgov Tell me about it. NS is one of the most left wing infested provinces in all of Canada. Does that even surprise you? The government here hates us.
@Caroleigh1 @HealthNS Oh, I see, you're an insane person. Suddenly your other comments make sense
@HealthNS We have to protect the people who are most at risk for hospitalization and death. It’s not about you, it’s  all about you doing what’s right for others.

@Africanlegnd @Jessie01311975 @HealthNS @nsgov A person who stands for peace on their profile doesn't condemn people to being stupid if one has decided not to get a vaccine. That's judgement & goes against peace and freedom of choice. Might want to revisit your values & morals because they only apply when you say.
@HealthNS Prof of VAX doesn't stop the spread of COVID. The last wave was driven by the fully vaccinated. It's false security not real security against COVID. Cancel the Vax passport.
@HealthNS @nsgov At least you’re doing one thing right
@HealthNS This is sickening and we were and still are being lied to
